#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
struct broom
{
    char c;
    int cost;
} table[10004];
int main()
{
    int n,l,i,j;
    long long dp[10004];
    char s[30];
    cin>>n;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%s %d",s,&l);
        table[i].c=s[0];
        table[i].cost=l;
    }
    dp[0]=0;
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(table[i].c=='f')
        {
            dp[i]=dp[i-1];
            continue;
        }
        dp[i]=dp[i-1];
        for(j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
        {
            if(table[j].cost==table[i].cost&&table[j].c=='f')
            {
                if(dp[j]+table[i].cost>dp[i])
                    dp[i]=dp[j]+table[i].cost;
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    cout<<dp[n-1]<<endl;
    return 0;
}
